column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=We spend an inordinate amount of time and money intervening in the affairs of other nations .

#Text=What if we were to redirect our efforts and capital toward improving vital issues at home ( i.e. , our homeless , our displaced veterans , illiteracy and poverty ( which continue to hover around 15 % ) , the availability of health care for every American , etc. ) ?

#Text=We could lead by example rather than try to convince the rest of the world why it should follow our model , and at the same time , we would be taking care of our citizens and restoring hope and dignity to their lives .
#Text=Future
#Text=If elected , what would constitute a successful presidency for you ?
#Text=Simplistically , if I could make meaningful progress toward achieving the goals I just listed , I would have a successful presidency .
#Text=De La Fuente :
#Text=" I do n't need to serve in a political office to be happy , but I would be honored to do so if I thought I could give something back to my country . "
#Text=Image : Marc Nozell .
#Text=Which individuals would you like to see in a De La Fuente administration ?
#Text=I would take a fundamentally different approach to staffing the De La Fuente administration .

#Text=Currently , over 80 percent of the senior White House staff positions and approximately 50 percent of the ambassadorships have gone to individuals who bundled $ 500 thousand or more for the current Administration .

#Text=While these people should n't be banned from serving the Administration if they are qualified , the disproportionate distribution suggests that the positions are more likely to be a repayment of political debt .
#Text=I will not do that .
#Text=I learned in business that I did best when I hired people who were better than me at what they did .
#Text=I did n't hire them to be subservient to me nor did I hire them because they were friends .
#Text=I think that same approach is needed in Washington , D.C. During these difficult times , we need our nation 's best and brightest individuals to tackle our problems .
#Text=I would select people to serve in my administration on a basis of merit .
#Text=Do you plan on ever running for political office again ?
#Text=I 'm a first generation American who is extreme[ly ] proud of being a citizen of this great country .
#Text=To give you some perspective , I once wanted to fly a large American flag over one of my car dealerships , but the city 's governing body emphatically said , " No ! "

#Text=For nine years , I fought back before winning the right to honor our country with what has become a prominent landmark ; a 3,000 square foot flag flying from the tallest free standing flag pole in the United States .
#Text=I do n't need to serve in a political office to be happy , but I would be honored to do so if I thought I could give something back to my country .
